Data Structures

  • struct SubstanceOutputDesc
    Substance output description and current state structure definition. More...

Enumerations

  • enum SubstanceOutputState { Substance_OState_NotComputed, Substance_OState_Ready, Substance_OState_Grabbed }

Detailed Description

Substance output description and current state structure.

Author:
Christophe Soum - Allegorithmic (christophe.soum@allegorithmic.com)
Note:
This file is part of the Substance engine headers
Date:
20080107
Copyright (c) Allegorithmic. All rights reserved.
Defines the SubstanceOutputDesc structure. Filled using the substanceHandleGetOutputDesc function declared in handle.h. Contains format, size, state, etc. information.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum SubstanceOutputState

Substance output state enumeration.

Pixel formats definitions include Mutually exclusive values. 8 bits format

Enumerator:
Substance_OState_NotComputed  Output not ready
Substance_OState_Ready  Output computed and ready
Substance_OState_Grabbed  Output already grabbed by the user
